about.title: About bioQuery
about.paragraph1: bioQuery is an innovative platform that aims to use artificial intelligence as a means to make scientific research accessible to everyone. bioQuery's mission is to enable consumers to make more informed choices by giving them access to reliable and up-to-date information on the components of the products they use daily.
about.paragraph2: By connecting consumers to the latest advances in scientific research, bioQuery aims to contribute to more responsible consumption and a better understanding of the impacts of our choices on our health.
